Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Welcome to the Beacon Institute. We are here to help new arrivals in the city have a place where they can learn and earn until they decide on where they best fit within city life" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "There are several ways to earn money in the city if you do not have a paying position. You can hunt skinks (ooc: fight command, then attack skink) and sell them to the Vermin Catcher, or fish with bare hands, a weapon, fishing pole or fishing net. You can buy the poles and nets from the Fishing merchant on the Docks and sell your fish to the fish monger there.\\r\\n\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "text", "I would like to extend my thanks to those good beings who have donated time and effort to make this guild a success. If not for their generosity, this guild would not be possible.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nGardeners Guild of Triskellian lead by Mister Fips \
\\r\\nThe Embassy of the Noble House of Doloreaux\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
" \}), (\{ "text", "Currently our teacher can train people in the following careers and skills:\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nCareers: \
\\r\\nCarpenter\
\\r\\nSoldier\
\\r\\nStonemason\
\\r\\nMerchant\
\\r\\nTranslator\
\\r\\nBlacksmith\
\\r\\nJeweler\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nSkills: \
\\r\\nEndurance\
\\r\\nOld\
\\r\\n" \}) \})
